PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08682022-07-07GAC,  ,  ,  , 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add twenty (20) individuals and thirteen (13) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; and (2) remove and add one (1) individual in Schedule 1 to revise the rationale for listing.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0170 Publication Date: 2022-07-20
AttachmentsAttachment
